titles.title: A resolution raising awareness of lake sturgeon (Acipenser fulvescens).
A resolution raising awareness of lake sturgeon (Acipenser fulvescens).

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This resolution encourages continued (1) collaboration among federal, state, tribal, and other partners to manage and increase lake sturgeon populations across their extensive range; and (2) efforts to identify, protect, and restore their habitat. It also encourages increased public awareness of lake sturgeon, including education on the proper ways to handle lake sturgeon if accidentally caught.
